text: Egha Judaba Iesus inigha Kaiafasɨn dɨpenim ategha an akua gavmanɨn dapanir ekiamɨn dɨpenimɨn zui. Ka bar mɨzaraghara. Egha me ghaze, “E Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzeghɨva, egh e God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiamɨn isar ekiamɨn asɨzim rameghan kogham.” Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me uari gavman dapanir ekiamɨn dɨpenimɨn aven ghuzir puvatɨ.(18:28) Gavmanɨn faragha zuir gumaziba, Pailat ko an adarasi, me bar Romɨn gumaziba. Egha Judabar Arazibar gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Me Godɨn damazimɨn zuegh ikiamin nɨghnɨziba puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Judaba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgha ghaze, me Romɨn gumaziba ko poroghɨva Godɨn damazimɨn ti mɨzegham.
